verses.verse: A psalm written by David for people going up to the temple to worship. Yahweh, I am not proud; I do not deserve to achieve impressive things in life. I do not worry about problems that are too difficult for me to solve.
Instead, I am calm and peaceful in my inner being like a small child who no longer nurses but is happy to be with its mother. In the same way, I am peaceful within my inner being.
You, my fellow Israelites, confidently expect that Yahweh will do good things for you now and forever!
